sources.title: Obsession 1949 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Obsession , released in the USA as The Hidden Room , is a 1949 British crime film directed by Edward Dmytryk, based on the 1947 book A Man About a Dog by Alec Coppel, who also wrote the screenplay for the film. Obsession was entered into the 1949 Cannes Film Festival.
